Set Workfile Location

The workfile location is initially set during project creation and stored in the workspace assigned to the project database. Use the Set Workfile Location dialog box (File | Set Workfile Location) to override it and set the default location for checking in, getting, and checking out workfiles. (You are still able to override this default location when you perform those functions.)

If the workspace is public, the specified workfile location affects all Users who will access the project or file using the public workspace. If the workspace is private, the specified workfile location will not affect other Users.

Field Descriptions

Workfile Location Enter the default location for checking in, getting, and checking out workfiles or click the Browse button to select one.
Workspace Information The workspace assigned to the project or file. If the workspace is public, the specified workfile location affects all Users who will access the project or file using the public workspace. If the workspace is private, the specified workfile location will not affect other Users.
